modules.title: Introduction to AgentCore
modules.description: Understand what Amazon Bedrock AgentCore is, why it exists, and its high-level architecture.

lessons.title: What is AgentCore?
lessons.description: An overview of AgentCore and its place in the AWS AI ecosystem.

lessons.title: Architecture Overview
lessons.description: High-level view of AgentCore's components and how they interact.

lessons.title: Key Concepts
lessons.description: Essential terminology and concepts you'll use throughout the course.

modules.title: Core Services Deep Dive
modules.description: Explore each service component in AgentCore - what it does, what problem it solves, and how it works.

lessons.title: Service Overview
lessons.description: Introduction to the core services and how they fit together.

lessons.title: Runtime Service
lessons.description: Deep dive into the agent runtime service.

lessons.title: Memory Service
lessons.description: Understanding agent memory and context management.

lessons.title: Tool Service
lessons.description: How tools are defined, registered, and executed.

modules.title: Agent Design Patterns
modules.description: Learn design patterns for building effective AI agents, including tool integration and memory management.

lessons.title: Tool Selection Patterns
lessons.description: How agents decide which tools to use.

lessons.title: Memory & Context Patterns
lessons.description: Strategies for managing conversation context and long-term memory.

lessons.title: Building Custom Tools
lessons.description: How to define and integrate custom tools/functions.

modules.title: Hands-On: Build Your First Agent
modules.description: Step-by-step walkthrough of building a simple but functional agent.

lessons.title: Project Setup
lessons.description: Setting up your development environment and AWS account.

lessons.title: Creating a Basic Agent
lessons.description: Write and deploy your first agent.

lessons.title: Adding Custom Tools
lessons.description: Extend your agent with custom capabilities.

modules.title: Security & IAM
modules.description: Understand permissions, data privacy, and security best practices for AgentCore.

lessons.title: IAM for AgentCore
lessons.description: Required permissions and IAM role configuration.

lessons.title: Data Privacy Considerations
lessons.description: How data flows through agents and privacy implications.

lessons.title: Security Best Practices
lessons.description: Hardening your agent deployments.

modules.title: Operations & Optimization
modules.description: Learn cost optimization, monitoring, error handling, and operational best practices.

lessons.title: Cost Optimization
lessons.description: Strategies for minimizing costs while maintaining performance.

lessons.title: Monitoring & Observability
lessons.description: Setting up logging, metrics, and alerts.

lessons.title: Error Handling & Retries
lessons.description: Building resilient agent systems.

modules.title: Advanced Topics
modules.description: Explore multi-agent orchestration, evaluation techniques, and scaling strategies.

lessons.title: Multi-Agent Orchestration
lessons.description: Coordinating multiple agents for complex tasks.

lessons.title: Evaluating Agent Performance
lessons.description: Metrics and techniques for measuring agent quality.

lessons.title: Scaling Strategies
lessons.description: Scaling your agent infrastructure for production loads.

modules.title: Production Deployment
modules.description: Deploy your agents to production with confidence, including testing strategies.

lessons.title: Testing Strategies
lessons.description: How to test AI agents effectively.

lessons.title: Deployment Patterns
lessons.description: Infrastructure patterns for production agent systems.

lessons.title: Going Live
lessons.description: Checklist and best practices for production launch.

modules.title: Capstone Project
modules.description: Build and deploy your own production AI agent from start to finish.

lessons.title: Choose Your Project
lessons.description: Select a capstone project and define your requirements.

lessons.title: Architecture Design
lessons.description: Design your agent's architecture using AgentCore services.

lessons.title: Implementation
lessons.description: Build your agent with custom tools and configuration.

lessons.title: Testing and Iteration
lessons.description: Test thoroughly and improve based on feedback.

lessons.title: Deploy and Celebrate
lessons.description: Deploy to production and share your accomplishment.
